summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2265, for the improvement of West Garfield Street, from 15th Avenue West across Smith's Cove Waterway, to 23rd Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway thereon, 26 feet in width, and by providing the necessary overhead crossings and bridges across Railroad Avenue and the Smtih's Cove Waterway, under Ordinance No. 23102 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
